properties.query: SELECT lecture_id, section_id, title, lecture_order, description FROM Lecture WHERE section_id = ?
INSERT INTO Lecture (section_id, title, description, lecture_order) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE Lecture SET title = ?, description = ?, lecture_order = ? WHERE lecture_id = ? AND section_id = ?
